summary: A Marine Corps drill instructor who is disgusted by the fact that the Corps now accepts draftees finds himself pitted against a hippie who has been drafted but refuses to accept the military's way of doing things.
cast: Darren McGavin|Earl Holliman|Jan-Michael Vincent|John Gruber|Danny Goldman|Richard Yniguez|Antone Curtis|Peter Hooten|David Buchanan|Ric Weaver|Harry Carter
title: Dos mundos opuestos
